Section 1: Design Company Overview / 設計公.Office Address / 辦公地址: 7/F, Sea Bird House, 22-28 Wyndham Street, Central, Hong Kong
Section 1: Design Company Overview / 設計公.Business Description / 公司或業務簡介:
SLA is an Asia-focused international design firm specializing in creating inspiring spaces. They offer a comprehensive range of services including Interior Design, Design & Build, Hospitality Design, Architectural Design, Sustainable Design, and Workspace Strategy.

A core strength is their extensive portfolio of work for major global corporations. Their key clients and featured projects span across prominent cities in Asia, such as Adobe in Tokyo, NVIDIA in Beijing, ByteDance (TikTok) and Microsoft in Kuala Lumpur, and Hotel Indigo in Taiwan's Alishan.

The company emphasizes a user-centric and practical approach, aiming to create environments that enhance productivity, comfort, and brand expression. A cornerstone of their promise is to deliver projects that are on time, within budget, practical, and beautiful.

Design Awards / 設計獎項.Award / 獎項: Muse Design Awards - Interior Design Office Category

Design Styles / 擅長風格: 現代輕奢風 / Modern Light Luxury Style

Insurance / 保險 (At least one required /.Insurance Type / 保險類型: General Liability insurance 第三者責任保險
